name: Your target is Apple
description:
Shooting the apple off old man's head using a bow and arrow!

Drag your finger to shoot the arrow targeting the apples. But beware of missing it or you might end up killing the man!

The first level of this game places you quite close to the man. If you hit the apple successfully without shooting the man then you move to the next level, where you'll be placed a little further away from the target, and so on. Hit the old man three times and it's game over.

Game Features:

Beautiful graphics & stunning animations
User friendly controls, touch, drag and shoot
Infinite mode.

If you enjoy shooting, aiming and hitting targets then this archery game is made for you.
